name: Unga Bunga
description:
PLAY WITH FULLSCREEN ON THE BROWSER VERSION, OR EVERYTHING BREAKS

Hi there, I made this game with 3 hours of development time for the Friday Night Game Jam, the theme being "Stone Age"

You play as Unga and Bunga, two cavemen from the stone age who were brought into the future to be tested for intelligence by a research facility. The duo must work together to get through the puzzles laid out by the scientists, making use of Unga's strength and Bunga's tools to reach the exit door.

Controls:

- A/D: Left/Right

- Space Bar: Jump

- E: Throw/Build

- R: Switch Character

You can use alt+ f4 to exit the game. Didn't have time to add an exit button
